doc.title: Ankhiyon Ke Jharokhon Se
doc.plot: Rajshri Productions emotional drama mainly to focus attention on blood cancer, featuring the lives of Arun Mathur (Sachin) and his college sweetheart, the cute Lilly Fernandes (Ranjeeta Kaur). Even though of different faiths, Arun is Hindu and Lilly Catholic, their parents agree to the marriage. Ruby Fernandes (Urmilla Fernandes) welcomes Arun and encourages him to call her "mommy". And Arun's dad (Madan Puri) is already making preparations for the marriage of his son, the forthcoming marriage, and welcoming his beautiful daughter-in-law in his palatial home. Then the doctor (Iftekhar) announces that Lilly has blood cancer and may not have very long to live. Lilly and her mom suppress this awful news from Arun, who is heartbroken when he is told that the engagement ceremoney has been cancelled. Arun's dad is shocked when Ruby informs him of Lilly fatal illness. Shri Mathur and the doctor discuss various ways of curing Lilly, and this includes other options. One of them is to let a doctor from abroad examine Lilly. But will this doctor be able to reach Lilly in time to save her? Will Arun ever come to know of Lilly's illness?
